text_block_list.text: Welcome!! And once again—I'm so glad you came to my Tracen Academy!!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: Expectation! I am looking forward to the brilliant success of both you and your Umamusume!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: Therefore! As a guiding principle for the future, I shall assign you tasks that I want you to accomplish as a Trainer—what are called "Missions"!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: Furthermore, when you achieve the Missions—a Reward! You will also receive a gift from me!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: ...Since I prepared this with my own pocket money, please... I ask you keep it strictly confidential from Tazuna...!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: Diligence! I ask that you strive hard, for yourself and, above all, for your assigned Umamusume!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
